title: forge test freezes in compilation stage while using fuzzer

body: Can you try running with the `RUST_LOG=trace` environment variable set?

@onbjerg 
yee, this shows up: 
`testNewPassWithoutAdmin(address)` is the name of the other function that I was fuzzing. It works fine if I don't fuzz `testPassUserGiveXp`. The last line of the below-pasted logs is where it hangs. 

```
2022-04-06T02:20:58.027604Z TRACE fuzz-test{name=testNewPassWithoutAdmin(address) should_fail=false}: foundry_evm::fuzz::strategies::calldata: input=[Address(0x75be54eca562594d0f2a20d0d1cc4c008cf6acda)]
2022-04-06T02:20:58.029631Z TRACE fuzz-test{name=testNewPassWithoutAdmin(address) should_fail=false}: foundry_evm::fuzz::strategies::calldata: input=[Address(0x3aeb251d98e8c5965bbdf5aadde9507ce0394a0b)]
2022-04-06T02:20:58.031811Z TRACE fuzz-test{name=testNewPassWithoutAdmin(address) should_fail=false}: foundry_evm::fuzz::strategies::calldata: input=[Address(0xedaa5ed422586c4d90ba8f10f79e709e287af557)]
2022-04-06T02:20:58.033808Z TRACE fuzz-test{name=testNewPassWithoutAdmin(address) should_fail=false}: foundry_evm::fuzz::strategies::state: input=[Address(0x32f04534d7b818ff322fe5e8d1726e4fa04eef0e)]
2022-04-06T02:20:58.035654Z TRACE fuzz-test{name=testNewPassWithoutAdmin(address) should_fail=false}: foundry_evm::fuzz::strategies::calldata: input=[Address(0xbfdd4e89f1441615a68719bd071efc08da35b0fe)]
2022-04-06T02:20:58.037452Z TRACE fuzz-test{name=testNewPassWithoutAdmin(address) should_fail=false}: foundry_evm::fuzz::strategies::calldata: input=[Address(0x74dd14d00bdbe9ad8cbf0b0317ed4a77fbc37661)]
2022-04-06T02:20:58.039228Z TRACE fuzz-test{name=testNewPassWithoutAdmin(address) should_fail=false}: foundry_evm::fuzz::strategies::calldata: input=[Address(0x4b6855bb4c3046c67ba3c50b2b6691c42ea0d1ac)]
2022-04-06T02:20:58.041015Z TRACE fuzz-test{name=testNewPassWithoutAdmin(address) should_fail=false}: foundry_evm::fuzz::strategies::state: input=[Address(0x32f04534d7b818ff322fe5e8d1726e4fa04eef0e)]
2022-04-06T02:20:58.043108Z TRACE fuzz-test{name=testNewPassWithoutAdmin(address) should_fail=false}: foundry_evm::fuzz::strategies::calldata: input=[Address(0x9987152425ef5ba6c27a0f6fe28836580d3718aa)]
2022-04-06T02:20:58.045274Z TRACE fuzz-test{name=testNewPassWithoutAdmin(address) should_fail=false}: foundry_evm::fuzz::strategies::calldata: input=[Address(0xeca4da8d80e97154400f7235b737c91bacaaec34)]
2022-04-06T02:20:58.047181Z TRACE fuzz-test{name=testNewPassWithoutAdmin(address) should_fail=false}: foundry_evm::fuzz::strategies::state: input=[Address(0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000)]
2022-04-06T02:20:58.049582Z TRACE fuzz-test{name=testNewPassWithoutAdmin(address) should_fail=false}: foundry_evm::fuzz::strategies::calldata: input=[Address(0xd6700a36ae930de7561f2e322e6f9041db1b4183)]
2022-04-06T02:20:58.051627Z TRACE fuzz-test{name=testNewPassWithoutAdmin(address) should_fail=false}: foundry_evm::fuzz::strategies::calldata: input=[Address(0x9c486bf4ea9a7b20cd5d772f5832fd460a768a0f)]

2022-04-06T02:20:58.058948Z TRACE fuzz-test{name=testNewPassWithoutAdmin(address) should_fail=false}: foundry_evm::fuzz::strategies::state: input=[Address(0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000)]
2022-04-06T02:20:58.060849Z TRACE fuzz-test{name=testNewPassWithoutAdmin(address) should_fail=false}: foundry_evm::fuzz::strategies::calldata: input=[Address(0x9c64ea45d0abd84024cf232fea41dffaa4bddc3e)]
2022-04-06T02:20:58.062906Z DEBUG fuzz-test{name=testNewPassWithoutAdmin(address) should_fail=false}: forge::runner: duration=767.914438ms success=true
```
Very interesting - do you get no output at all from your other tests? Also, if you do `forge test --match-test testPassUserGiveXp`, does it still freeze?

I don't get any output. It just freezes in the compiling stage. `forge test --match-test testPassUserGiveXp` still freezes.

this is what i see:
```
dhcp-128-189-74-112:contracts user$ forge test --match-test testPassUserGiveXp
[⠰] Compiling...
No files changed, compilation skipped
```
